patthana10.17:2.1: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Piṭṭhidukaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana10.17:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo
patthana10.17:3.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana10.17:3.1_2: naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana10.17:3.1_3: nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana10.17:4.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo
patthana10.17:4.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana10.17:5.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:8.1: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana10.17:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo
patthana10.17:9.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana10.17:9.1_2: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana10.17:9.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:10.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo
patthana10.17:10.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana10.17:10.1_2: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana10.17:10.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana10.17:11.1_1: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana10.17:11.1_2: naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana10.17:11.1_3: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana10.17:11.1_4: naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana10.17:12.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṁsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi sabbattha nava.)
